title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Removed expired notice and versioning condition in GitHub Advanced Security billing documentation.
Enhanced Table of Contents generator to support 5-level article nesting with depth control.
Updated style guide: replaced "below" with "here" in licensing guidance and added rules for release references (use "or later").
Added script documentation for ToC generation tool.

- Added script documentation for ToC generation tool.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Removed expired notice and versioning condition in GitHub Advanced Security billing documentation.
- Enhanced Table of Contents generator to support 5-level article nesting with depth control.
- Updated style guide: replaced "below" with "here" in licensing guidance and added rules for release references (use "or later").
- Added script documentation for ToC generation tool.

### Title
Enhance ToC nesting, update style guide, and remove expired billing notice
